articles.author: Devan Cole, Juliana Battaglia and Konstantin Toropin, CNN
articles.title: Mississippi governor signs bill banning transgender students from women's sports, approving first anti-trans law of 2021
articles.description: Transgender athletes in Mississippi's public schools and colleges will no longer be allowed to compete in women's sports after the state's Republican governor on Thursday signed the first statewide anti-trans law of 2021.

articles.author: Ray Sanchez and Will Brown, CNN
articles.title: Austin, Texas, police officer indicted for murder in fatal shooting
articles.description: A grand jury has indicted an Austin, Texas, police officer on a first-degree murder charge in the fatal shooting of 42-year-old Michael Brent Ramos in April, Travis County District Attorney José Garza said Thursday.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Perseverance rover sends back sounds of zapping rocks on Mars
articles.description: New audio returned from the rover includes the popping sound of the rover's SuperCam instrument as it zaps rocks with its laser. It's the first time we've heard what it sounds like when a laser interacts with a rock on another planet.

articles.title: Drone footage shows extent of damage from Equatorial Guinea blast
articles.description: Footage shows the scale of the destruction from a series of explosions in Equatorial Guinea. The which happened at a military base in the port city of Bata on March 7.
